languages.text: "За свой необдуманный поступок я готова принять от вас лично любое наказание, какое вы сочтете нужным. Можно прямо здесь, у всех на виду".

traits.locale_text: "За свой необдуманный поступок я готова принять от вас лично любое наказание, какое вы сочтете нужным. Можно прямо здесь, у всех на виду".

languages.text: "I am ready to accept any punishment you deem appropriate for my thoughtless actions. You may deliver it personally, right here, in front of everyone."
languages.original_text: "За свой необдуманный поступок я готова принять от вас лично любое наказание, какое вы сочтете нужным. Можно прямо здесь, у всех на виду".

traits.locale_text: "I am ready to accept any punishment you deem appropriate for my thoughtless actions. You may deliver it personally, right here, in front of everyone."
"I am ready to accept any punishment you deem appropriate for my thoughtless actions. You may deliver it personally, right here, in front of everyone."
"I am ready to accept any punishment you deem appropriate for my thoughtless actions. You may deliver it personally, right here, in front of everyone."
"I am ready to accept any punishment you deem appropriate for my thoughtless actions. You may deliver it personally, right here, in front of everyone."

languages.text: “我愿为我的莽撞行为接受惩罚，只要你认为合适就行。你可以在这里，当着所有人的面，亲自进行宣判。”
languages.original_text: "I am ready to accept any punishment you deem appropriate for my thoughtless actions. You may deliver it personally, right here, in front of everyone."

traits.locale_text: “我愿为我的莽撞行为接受惩罚，只要你认为合适就行。你可以在这里，当着所有人的面，亲自进行宣判。”

languages.text: «Estoy dispuesta a aceptar cualquier castigo que considere oportuno por mis atolondradas acciones. Puede aplicarlo usted personalmente aquí mismo, delante de todos».
languages.original_text: "I am ready to accept any punishment you deem appropriate for my thoughtless actions. You may deliver it personally, right here, in front of everyone."

traits.locale_text: «Estoy dispuesta a aceptar cualquier castigo que considere oportuno por mis atolondradas acciones. Puede aplicarlo usted personalmente aquí mismo, delante de todos».

languages.text: 「私の軽率な行動に対し、あなたが適切と考える罰なら何でも受け入れよう。この場で、皆の前で、個人的に罰を受けても構わない」
languages.original_text: "I am ready to accept any punishment you deem appropriate for my thoughtless actions. You may deliver it personally, right here, in front of everyone."

traits.locale_text: 「私の軽率な行動に対し、あなたが適切と考える罰なら何でも受け入れよう。この場で、皆の前で、個人的に罰を受けても構わない」

languages.text: « Je suis {mf|prêt|prête} à accepter tout châtiment que vous jugerez approprié. Vous pouvez même me l'infliger immédiatement, devant tout le monde. »
languages.original_text: "I am ready to accept any punishment you deem appropriate for my thoughtless actions. You may deliver it personally, right here, in front of everyone."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis {mf|prêt|prête} à accepter tout châtiment que vous jugerez approprié. Vous pouvez même me l'infliger immédiatement, devant tout le monde. »

languages.text: "Ich bin bereit, meine Strafe zu akzeptieren, die Ihr für meine unüberlegten Handlungen vorgesehen habt. Ihr könnt sie persönlich überbringen, hier, vor allen anderen."
languages.original_text: "I am ready to accept any punishment you deem appropriate for my thoughtless actions. You may deliver it personally, right here, in front of everyone."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin bereit, meine Strafe zu akzeptieren, die Ihr für meine unüberlegten Handlungen vorgesehen habt. Ihr könnt sie persönlich überbringen, hier, vor allen anderen."

languages.text: "Düşünmeden yaptığım eylemlere uygun gördüğün tüm cezaları kabul etmeye hazırım. Cezanı tam burada, herkesin önünde şahsen verebilirsin."
languages.original_text: "I am ready to accept any punishment you deem appropriate for my thoughtless actions. You may deliver it personally, right here, in front of everyone."
